CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Thanks to the many attempts that have been made to develop NIR absorbing polymers , a notable improvement of the overall power - conversion efficiency ( PCE ) has been achieved.

Let's think step by step.

1. NIR absorbing polymers

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph. They refer to polymers that absorb near-infrared (NIR) radiation.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Thanks to the many attempts that have been made to develop NIR absorbing polymers , a notable improvement of the overall power - conversion efficiency ( PCE ) has been achieved.

Let's think step by step.

1. NIR absorbing polymers
2. overall power - conversion efficiency (PCE)
3. notable improvement

These entities can be considered as "Property Value" as they represent specific values or improvements related to the NIR absorbing polymers and power conversion efficiency.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. overall power - conversion efficiency (PCE)

This entity is the only one that clearly refers to a material property value, specifically the power conversion efficiency of the NIR absorbing polymers.
